baseQueries.description: This a consumer segment base query
baseQueries.name: consumer_segment
all_segments
baseQueries.sql: SELECT *, TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', order_date), 'YYYY-MM') AS month FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }}

baseQueries.description: This is a big query dataset
baseQueries.name: bigquery_orders
baseQueries.sql: with cte as ( select * from sales_data.orders) select * from cte

filters.sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }} GROUP BY category ORDER BY category ASC LIMIT 50
filters.title: Category

filters.sql: SELECT region, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }} GROUP BY region ORDER BY region ASC LIMIT 50
filters.title: Sales Region

filters.sql: SELECT min(order_date) as min, max(order_date) as max FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }}
filters.title: Order Date

filters.sql: SELECT row_id, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }} GROUP BY row_id ORDER BY row_id ASC LIMIT 50
filters.title: Row Id
